title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Practice-Centered Mathematics Instructional Design Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Instructional Theories and Curriculum Design Experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematics lesson plans aligned with the 2015 Revised National Curriculum standards using VR simulations
Learners can develop lesson plans that meet at least 80% alignment between learning objectives, activities, and assessments in a simulated environment
Learners can develop three or more mathematics lesson scenarios using mobile-accessible digital resources

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
